name: High Street Baptist Church
description: Baptist church located in Somerset, Kentucky, serving the community with worship services, Sunday School, and various ministries. The church offers Celebrate Recovery programs for individuals struggling with addiction, hurt, or pain. High Street Baptist Church is committed to being a church filled with people who love God and love others, who seek to grow in Christ through community, and who serve the world beginning in Pulaski County. The church provides a safe place for community and spiritual growth.
source: Verified from official church website and FindHelp.org directory
hours_of_operation: Sunday: 9:45 AM Sunday School, 11:00 AM Morning Worship, 6:00 PM Evening Worship; Wednesday: 7:00 PM Adult Discipleship Classes
notes: Church offers Celebrate Recovery programs on Thursdays at 6:00 PM. Main church phone: (606) 678-8973. Church has active youth programs and family ministries.
